verses.verse: Again in the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3789>write<s%> thee the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>, even of this <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5564>set<s%> himself against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> this <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4911>utter<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> unto the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Set <S%H8239>on<s%> a <S%H5518>pot<s%>, set it <S%H8239>on<s%>, and also <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> into it:

<S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H5409>pieces<s%> thereof into it, even every <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5409>piece<s%>, the <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, and the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>; <S%H4390>fill<s%> it with the <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%>.

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and <S%H1754>burn<s%> also the <S%H6106>bones<s%> under it, and make it <S%H7570>boil<s%> <S%H7571>well<s%>, and let them <S%H1310>seethe<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of it <S%H8432>therein<s%>. burn: or, heap

Wherefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, to the <S%H5518>pot<s%> whose <S%H2457>scum<s%> is therein, and whose <S%H2457>scum<s%> is not gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of it! bring it <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5409>piece<s%> by <S%H5409>piece<s%>; let no <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon it.

For her <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her; she <S%H7760>set<s%> it upon the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock<s%>; she <S%H8210>poured<s%> it not upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, to <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>dust<s%>;

That it might cause <S%H2534>fury<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5358>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>; I have <S%H5414>set<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock<s%>, that it should not be <S%H3680>covered<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>! I will even make the <S%H4071>pile<s%> for fire <S%H1431>great<s%>.

<S%H7235>Heap<s%> on <S%H6086>wood<s%>, <S%H1814>kindle<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, <S%H8552>consume<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H7543>spice<s%> it <S%H4841>well<s%>, and let the <S%H6106>bones<s%> be <S%H2787>burned<s%>.

Then <S%H5975>set<s%> it <S%H7386>empty<s%> upon the <S%H1513>coals<s%> thereof, that the <S%H5178>brass<s%> of it may be <S%H3179>hot<s%>, and may <S%H2787>burn<s%>, and that the <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> of it may be <S%H5413>molten<s%> in <S%H8432>it<s%>, that the <S%H2457>scum<s%> of it may be <S%H8552>consumed<s%>.

She hath <S%H3811>wearied<s%> herself with <S%H8383>lies<s%>, and her <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2457>scum<s%> went not <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of her: her <S%H2457>scum<s%> shall be in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

In thy <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> is <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>: because I have <S%H2891>purged<s%> thee, and thou wast not <S%H2891>purged<s%>, thou shalt not be <S%H2891>purged<s%> from thy <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> any more, till I have caused my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon thee.

I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it: it shall come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> it; I will not go <S%H6544>back<s%>, neither will I <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I <S%H5162>repent<s%>; according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and according to thy <S%H5949>doings<s%>, shall they <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
Also the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, behold, I take <S%H3947>away<s%> from thee the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> with a <S%H4046>stroke<s%>: yet neither shalt thou <S%H5594>mourn<s%> nor <S%H1058>weep<s%>, neither shall thy <S%H1832>tears<s%> run <S%H935>down<s%>. run down: Heb. go

<S%H1826>Forbear<s%> to <S%H602>cry<s%>, <S%H6213>make<s%> no <S%H60>mourning<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, <S%H2280>bind<s%> the tire of thine <S%H6287>head<s%> upon thee, and put <S%H7760>on<s%> thy <S%H5275>shoes<s%> upon thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H5844>cover<s%> not thy <S%H8222>lips<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>. Forbear: Heb. Be silent lips: Heb. upper lip

So I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and at <S%H6153>even<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>; and I <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Wilt thou not <S%H5046>tell<s%> us what these things are to us, that thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> so?
Then I <S%H559>answered<s%> them, The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H559>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of your <S%H5797>strength<s%>, the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and that which your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4263>pitieth<s%>; and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> whom ye have <S%H5800>left<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>. that: Heb. the pity of your soul
And ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done<s%>: ye shall not <S%H5844>cover<s%> your <S%H8222>lips<s%>, nor <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>.

And your <S%H6287>tires<s%> shall be upon your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> upon your <S%H7272>feet<s%>: ye shall not <S%H5594>mourn<s%> nor <S%H1058>weep<s%>; but ye shall pine <S%H4743>away<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, and <S%H5098>mourn<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> toward <S%H251>another<s%>.

Thus <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> is unto you a <S%H4159>sign<s%>: according to all that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%>: and when this <S%H935>cometh<s%>, ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

Also, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, shall it not be in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H3947>take<s%> from them their <S%H4581>strength<s%>, the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of their <S%H8597>glory<s%>, the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and that whereupon they <S%H4853>set<s%> their <S%H5315>minds<s%>, their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, that: Heb. the lifting up of their soul
That he that <S%H6412>escapeth<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, to cause thee to <S%H2045>hear<s%> it with thine <S%H241>ears<s%>?

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be <S%H6605>opened<s%> to him which is <S%H6412>escaped<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and be no more <S%H481>dumb<s%>: and thou shalt be a <S%H4159>sign<s%> unto them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
